item.title: Using Stata in R with {RStata} and {pushoverr}
item.description: I recently took over a project that made use of Stata to perform the analysis and subsequently used R to create plots of the results. Inspired by this blogpost from Frederick Solt, I wanted to see if I could set up my project to run start-to-finish from a single script (i.e.Â could I call Stata efficiently from R to perform the analysis, and then immediately use R to plot the results?
